00120 class DLL_EXP CKDConfBool
00121 {
00122 public:
00131     CKDConfBool(CKDConf *pConf, LPCTSTR lpKey, bool bDefault, bool bWriteDefConf = false, bool bReadOnly = false)
00132         : m_pConf(pConf), m_sKey(lpKey), m_bDefault(bDefault), m_bWriteDefConf(bWriteDefConf), m_bReadOnly(bReadOnly)
00133     {
00134         pConf->SignKey(lpKey);
00135     }
00136 
00142     inline bool operator =(bool bValue) {
00143         if (!m_bWriteDefConf && (m_bDefault == bValue))
00144             m_pConf->DeleteKey(m_sKey);
00145         else if (m_bReadOnly)
00146             return m_bDefault;
00147         else
00148             m_pConf->SetBool(m_sKey, bValue);
00149         return bValue;
00150     }
00155     inline operator bool() { return m_pConf->GetBool(m_sKey, m_bDefault); }

00220 class DLL_EXP CKDConfString : protected CKDString
00221 {
00222 public:
00231     CKDConfString(CKDConf *pConf, LPCTSTR lpKey, LPCTSTR lpDefault, bool bWriteDefConf = false, bool bReadOnly = false)
00232         : m_pConf(pConf), m_sKey(lpKey), m_sDefault(lpDefault), m_bWriteDefConf(bWriteDefConf), m_bReadOnly(bReadOnly)
00233     {
00234         pConf->SignKey(lpKey);
00235         CKDString::SetString(lpDefault);
00236     }
00237 
00243     inline CKDConfString& SetString(LPCTSTR lpValue) {
00244         if (!m_bWriteDefConf && (m_sDefault == lpValue)) {
00245             m_pConf->DeleteKey(m_sKey);
00246             CKDString::SetString(lpValue);
00247         } else if (m_bReadOnly) {
00248             CKDString::SetString(m_sDefault);
00249         } else {
00250             m_pConf->SetString(m_sKey, lpValue);
00251             CKDString::SetString(lpValue);
00252         }
00253         return *this;
00254     }
00255 
00259     inline CKDConfString& operator =(LPCTSTR lpValue) { return SetString(lpValue); }
00264     inline operator LPCTSTR() { SetString(m_pConf->GetString(m_sKey, m_sDefault)); return GetString(); }
